subproject.description:
I) Vulnerable communities of the villages of Samthang, Lawa, Lamgang, Thaphu and Metana provided with basic house building skills; support to enable school going children to stay in school; make the community more credit worthy; improve marketing of their artisan craft products and surplus agricultural products; and improve nutrition intake of households.
II) The capacity of local governments to plan, implement and monitor their development plans enhanced.
III) The specific needs of employment and income generating activities of rural women in Samtse and Zhemgang addressed.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Targeted poverty reduction

subproject.description: Poverty Alleviation and Empowerment of Rural Women - The AWP aims to address the specific needs of employment and income generating activities of rural women in Samtse and Zhemgang.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Poverty Alleviation of R/Women
